Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Enacts the "unique abilities employment act"
Summary: Enacts the "unique abilities employment act" relating to the employment of persons with developmental disabilities by school districts.
LawCode: Add ยง55-d, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to the employment of persons with developmental disabilities by school districts
